about_the_game:
H1-Castle of Shadows

4E Fantasy Token Pack

Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • blue slime (large)
  • clay scout (small)
  • corruption corpse (medium)
  • dark creeper (small)
  • elf archer
  • gelatinous cube (large)
  • ghoul (medium)
  • gnome (small)
  • goblin crazy (small)
  • goblin cutter (small)
  • goblin fat (small)
  • goblin sharpshooter (small)
  • goblin warrior (small)
  • guard drake (small)
  • halfling slinger (small)
  • hobgoblin archer (medium)
  • hobgoblin grunt (medium)
  • hobgoblin soldier (medium)
  • hobgoblin torturer (medium)
  • hobgoblin warcaster (medium)
  • hobgoblin warchief (medium)
  • human berserker (medium)
  • human rabble (medium)
  • kobold dragonshield (small)
  • kobold minion (small)
  • kobold skirmisher (small)
  • kobold slinger (small)
  • kobold wyrmpriest (small)
  • kruthik adult (medium)
  • kruthik hatchling (small)
  • kruthik young (small)
  • ochre jelly (large)
  • orcus priest (medium)
  • orcus underpriest (medium)
  • pregen dragonborn paladin
  • pregen dwarf fighter
  • pregen halfelf cleric
  • pregen halfling rogue
  • pregen human wizard
  • pregen tiefling warlord
  • rat giant (small)
  • rat swarm
  • skeleton decrepit (medium)
  • skeleton knight (medium)
  • skeleton warrior (medium)
  • spider deathjump (medium)
  • vampire spawn (medium)
  • wight deathlock
  • zombie gravehound (medium)
  • zombie (medium)
  • zombie rotter (medium)

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on January 16, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
